channel.title: Single Sign-On (SSO) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Single Sign-On (SSO) at Okta Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 345 Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Answers “What is SSO?”, how it differs from a basic sign in, and “How Okta supports it”. Also “How does a user experience SSO from the Okta End User Dashboard or from another place?
